mapper.select: SELECT fu.fb_user_name FROM fb_user fu LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM attend WHERE vote_id = ( SELECT vote_id FROM vote WHERE vote_date = #{sunday} ) ) a ON fu.fb_user_id = a.fb_user_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.fb_user_id IS NULL AND fu.fb_user_del_yn = 'N' AND fu.fb_user_member_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY fu.fb_user_birth

SELECT fu.fb_user_id , fu.fb_user_name, a.attend_status FROM fb_user fu LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM attend WHERE vote_id = ( SELECT vote_id FROM vote WHERE vote_date = #{sunday} ) ) a ON fu.fb_user_id = a.fb_user_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.fb_user_id IS NOT NULL AND fu.fb_user_del_yn = 'N' AND fu.fb_user_member_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY a.attend_mod_date desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM attend WHERE vote_id = ( SELECT vote_id FROM vote WHERE vote_date = #{voteDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE attend SET attend_status = #{attendStatus}, attend_mod_date = now() WHERE 1=1 AND fb_user_id = #{fbUserId} AND vote_id = ( SELECT vote_id FROM vote WHERE vote_date = #{sunday} )
